import React from 'react' const HostelCard = ({hostel}) => { return (

{hostel.NAME}

{hostel.ADDRESS.length>50 ? hostel.ADDRESS.substr(0,50)+'...' : hostel.ADDRESS}

{hostel.CATEGORY} Hostel

) } export default HostelCard
